com.nitrous.gwt.earth.client.api.event
Interface ViewChangeListener

public interface ViewChangeListener

Listen for events that are fired when the view is changing in Earth. Register this event listener to the GEView.

Author:
nick

Method Summary
 void onViewChange()
          Event fired while the view is changing in Earth.
 void onViewChangeBegin()
          Event fired when the view begins changing in Earth.
 void onViewChangeEnd()
          Event fired when the view stops changing in Earth.
 

Method Detail

onViewChangeBegin

void onViewChangeBegin()
Event fired when the view begins changing in Earth. This event will be fired once, followed by successive onViewChange() events, and ending with a onViewChangeEnd() event.

onViewChange

void onViewChange()
Event fired while the view is changing in Earth. This event will be triggered in rapid succession while the camera is in motion.

onViewChangeEnd

void onViewChangeEnd()
Event fired when the view stops changing in Earth.
